 2013-06052013-05-30,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  VAC, 
ActDepartment of Veterans Affairs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Veterans Burial Regulations, 2005
PrecisRegulations amending the VETERANS BURIAL REGULATIONS, 2005, in order to increase the maximum amount provided for funeral services from $3,600 to $7,376, and to simplify the Program by cutting red tape and allowing flexibility in the type of funeral services that are eligible.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0110 Publication Date: 2013-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
